channel.title: Webclient can't connect if hosted on webhost
channel.description: Hello everyone, I made a webclient, and the files work just fine. If I open my index.html the webclients starts up and downloads the cache with no problem. It logs in just fine, but when I uploaded it to 000webhost.com wich is my webhost, the client wasn't able to connect anymore. Then I tried hosting the webclient on my own computer using wampp and after that just apache, and it worked just fine, the problem is that only people in my home network can connect to it and I can't get my port 80 open, I was just wondering why this doesn't workl on 000webhost.com or other webhosts I tried, any ideas? and yes my port 43594 is open!

item.title: Webclient can't connect if hosted on webhost
item.dc:creator: @trollpkz trollpkz
item.description:
@trollpkz wrote:

umm u can do it on 000webhosts.com u have to upload ur client.jar (what every u called it) then go to the link of it (e.g www.trollpkz.example.com/client.jar) copy it edit ur webclient.html and where it says the .jar take that off and paste in the url ad it should work It worked for me hope it helps! ;D

Read full topic
item.source: Webclient can't connect if hosted on webhost

item.title: Webclient can't connect if hosted on webhost
item.dc:creator: @artego artego
item.description:
@artego wrote:

Hello everyone,
I made a webclient, and the files work just fine.
If I open my index.html the webclients starts up and downloads the cache with no problem.
It logs in just fine, but when I uploaded it to 000webhost.com wich is my webhost, the client wasn’t able to connect anymore. Then I tried hosting the webclient on my own computer using wampp and after that just apache, and it worked just fine, the problem is that only people in my home network can connect to it and I can’t get my port 80 open, I was just wondering why this doesn’t workl on 000webhost.com or other webhosts I tried, any ideas? and yes my port 43594 is open!
